description: Reschedules a planned domain configuration change for a later time. This change can be a scheduled service software update or a blue/green Auto-Tune enhancement.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The name of the domain to reschedule an action for.

parameters.name: ActionID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the action to reschedule. To retrieve this ID, send a ListScheduledActions request.

parameters.name: ActionType
parameters.description: The type of action to reschedule. Can be one of SERVICE_SOFTWARE_UPDATE, JVM_HEAP_SIZE_TUNING, or JVM_YOUNG_GEN_TUNING. To retrieve this value, send a ListScheduledActions request.

parameters.name: ScheduleAt
parameters.description: When to schedule the action. NOW - Immediately schedules the update to happen in the current hour if there's capacity available. TIMESTAMP - Lets you specify a custom date and time to apply the update. If you specify this value, you must also provide a value for DesiredStartTime. OFF_PEAK_WINDOW - Marks the action to be picked up during an upcoming off-peak window. There's no guarantee that the change will be implemented during the next immediate window. Depending on capacity, it might happen in subsequent days.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the scheduled action.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of action that will be taken on the domain.

nested_items.name: ScheduledTime
nested_items.description: The time when the change is scheduled to happen.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the action to be taken.

nested_items.name: ScheduledBy
nested_items.description: Whether the action was scheduled manually ( CUSTOMER, or by OpenSearch Service automatically ( SYSTEM).

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the scheduled action.

nested_items.name: Mandatory
nested_items.description: Whether the action is required or optional.

nested_items.name: Cancellable
nested_items.description: Whether or not the scheduled action is cancellable.
